Rules.FriendlyName: FxCop rules used by the ASP.NET WebHooks team

Rule.Name: UnusedResourceUsageRule
Rule.Description: This rule fires when a resource is unused in the assembly.

Rule.Name: Do not use finalizers
Rule.Description: For performance reasons, managed types should not implement finalizers.
Rule.Resolution: Type '{0}' has a finalizer. Use SafeHandle to contain unmanaged data instead.

Rule.Name: Do not construct instances of the Task-related types
Rule.Description: For performance reasons, all tasks should be created using the TaskHelpers library.
Rule.Resolution: Do not construct instances of Task-related types. If you need to create a Task, use the TaskHelpers class instead.

Rule.Name: Do not call problematic methods on Task
Rule.Description: For performance reasons, use the TaskHelpers and TaskHelpersExtensions library rather than methods on Task.

Rule.Name: Do not call use problematic Task types
Rule.Description: For performance reasons, use the TaskHelpers and TaskHelpersExtensions library rather than Task-related types.
